title: Pen Pals
description: When Jennifer, a major force on Wall Street, concedes to take the rap for her boss, who has been wreaking illegal havoc on the SEC, because her fiance is a lawyer with connections, she unexpectedly finds herself in Jennings Correctional Facility for Women where she encounters a fiesty group of smart, tough women who change her life forever, in a hilarious novel of revenge. 50,000 first printing.
author: Olivia Goldsmith
